text: Next we are going to add a prompt when the user is in edit mode and switches to a locale that doesn't exist. Note that in this demo both US locales do not exist. (en_us, es_us)
paragraph: To do this all we have to do is call the useLocalePromptPlugin and pass it when a condition that when true will show the model. Try it out! Go ahead and click us in the Locale switcher in the toolbar and choose sp_us
